system.requirements: Tier 2; Fel 35, WP 35, is a Ministorum Priest. Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect:
When a character within the squad spends XP to remove Insanity Points, they can remove one additional Insanity Point per 100xp Spent. 
This still doesn't allow a squad member to reduce Insanity Below a Degree of Madness.
